#summary concept document presents physical measurements and what to expect when getting it.

= Introduction =

The concept document aims to present measurements' properties what ever the data format is. It defines what is expected by the information system for a particular physical measurement.

A concept dictionary is the key to permit interoperability of a software application between different data formats of a similar experiment from various institutes.
